name: 4K Webcam with Ring Light Web Cam 4K Autofocus with TOF Computer Camera 1080P 60FPS Web Camera Built-in Privacy Cover and Microphone Streaming Webcams for Zoom/Skype/Google Meet
short_description: 【4K UHD Webcam】This webcam for pc supports resolutions from 4K@30FPS to 1080P@60FPS, with frame rates that capture every detail for a clear and smooth video conferencing experience. This web cam is perfect for conference calls, online classes or live streaming.

Adapt to different environments, always present the best skin color. The streaming camera's innovative outer ring rotary adjustment brightness light intensity control, even in low light conditions can also get the best fill light effect.

【TOF autofocus dual noise-canceling microphones】The TOF fast autofocus function instantly locks onto faces or moving objects, ensuring ultra-clear image quality performance in dynamic scenes stays in perfect focus. Equipped with dual noise-canceling microphones, this computer camera effectively reduces background noises such as keyboard tapping and air-conditioning operation, ensuring that your voice is always clearly conveyed.

【Built-in Privacy Cover】The 4K webcam has a built-in sliding privacy cover that physically blocks the lens with a gentle push, completely eliminating the risk of hackers peeking in or privacy leaks, allowing you to control your privacy and security at all times.

【Widely Compatible】The web camera runs easily on multiple platforms such as Windows (Win7, 10, 11), Mac OS 10.6 and higher and Linux. Ideal for use with Zoom, Teams and other popular communication software such as Skype, Facetime, Microsoft Teams and more.

【True Plug and Play】Enjoy instant setup via a universal USB connection - simply plug the cable into your laptop/desktop and the usb camera is automatically activated in seconds. No drivers to install and no software configuration required.

name: 4K Webcam for PC with PDAF & CDAF Dual-autofocus, Ultra 4K HD, 2 Noise Reduction Mics, Auto Light Correction, USB-A, Privacy Cover, 79°FOV, Streaming Camera for PC, Mac, Laptop, Video Calls
short_description: Ultra HD 4K Resolution & Smooth Frame Rates: This 4K webcam for PC delivers ultra-high-definition clarity with 4K resolution at 30FPS, ensuring sharp detail in every frame. It also supports 1080P at 60FPS for smooth, lag-free video calls, streaming, and online learning. Whether you're attending virtual meetings, live streaming, or taking part in online classes, enjoy exceptional video quality without distortion or delay. Perfect for both professional and personal use.

Dual Autofocus Technology: Equipped with PDAF (Phase Detection Autofocus) and CDAF (Contrast Detection Autofocus), this 4K streaming webcam ensures fast and precise focusing, even in changing lighting conditions. PDAF provides quick subject tracking, while CDAF fine-tunes details for crisp, sharp images. Ideal for online teaching, presentations, and video calls, this UHD 4K web camera keeps you perfectly focused without any blur, even while moving.

Privacy Cover & 79° Wide-Angle View: This 4K webcam features a built-in webcam privacy cover, allowing you to block the lens when not in use to prevent unauthorized access, ensuring maximum security for both personal and professional use. This 79° wide-angle camera captures a broader field of view without distortion, making it perfect for group video calls, virtual meetings, live streaming, and online teaching. Whether you're using this Ultra HD webcam for work, gaming, or content creation, enjoy a secure and immersive video experience with crystal-clear quality.

Plug & Play with Universal Compatibility: This USB webcam is designed for effortless use—simply plug it into your device, and you're ready to go, no drivers required. It works seamlessly with Windows, Mac, and Linux, making it an ideal choice for video conferencing, remote work, live streaming, and online learning. Compatible with major platforms like Zoom, Skype, Teams, and OBS, this 4K streaming webcam ensures a hassle-free experience across all applications, whether for professional or personal use.

Dual Noise-Cancelling Mics with 3M Pickup Range: This 4K web camera features dual noise-cancelling microphones, filtering out background sounds for crystal-clear audio. With an impressive 3-meter pickup range, it captures your voice clearly from a distance, making it ideal for virtual meetings, live streaming, and online classes. Whether using it as a 4K streaming webcam, Ultra HD webcam, or USB webcam, enjoy superior sound quality without interference, ensuring clear communication in any environment.
product_details: Special Features ‎4K@30FPS or 1080P@60FPS Smooth Video, Advanced PDAF + CDAF Auto Focus, Dual Built-in Microphones with Noise Cancellation, Privacy Cover and 79°FOV, USB-A Plug & Play

name: EMEET C950 4K Webcam for PC - PDAF Autofocus, USB Webcam with Microphone & Physical Privacy Cover, 1080P@60FPS, USB 2.0 Plug&Play, No Tripod Hole, Web Cam w/ 70°View for Meeting/Online Classes/Zoom
short_description: 8 Megapixels 4K UHD Unmatched Clarity – Supporting resolutions and frame rates from 4K@30FPS to 1080P@60FPS, the EMEET C950 4K webcam delivers crisp and detailed video when used under proper lighting and with compatible platforms. Ideal for remote business meetings, online education, live streaming, and game broadcasting, this 4K webcam features a CMOS sensor for enhanced low-light performance. Note: Actual video resolution may vary depending on camera software or apps such as PotPlayer/OBS.

Unparalleled Performance with PDAF Autofocus - 4K Webcam C950's PDAF autofocus offers advantages over common autofocus in faster speed, higher precision, and more stable performance. The recommended focusing distance under natural lighting conditions is between 4 inches and 10 feet. 70 ° FOV focuses on you rather than your background, providing a good user experience where unwanted backgrounds will be blocked. EMEETLINK lets you customize image settings and upgrade firmware easily.

Excellent Audio Clarity & Flexible Design - With a built-in omnidirectional microphone, the C950 4K webcam delivers flawless communication up to 6 feet away, making it ideal for busy offices or home setups where noisy background sound may be a disturbance. The EMEET C950 webcam for pc 4K's flexible bracket design allows for a 15° ±3° vertical forward angle and a 90° ±3° vertical backward angle, providing ideal viewing angles for various scenes captured from high and low angles of desktop work.

Convenient Plug&Play, Guaranteed Privacy Protection - The C950 web cam 4K combines ease of use with top-tier security. With USB 2.0 plug-and-play functionality, this 4K webcam for laptop ensures easy connectivity, smooth data transfer, and stable performance without complex drivers. Privacy protection features include a physical cover to block the lens, no Bluetooth to avoid leaks, no WiFi to prevent breaches, no drivers to reduce vulnerabilities, and no cloud storage to keep all data local.

Compatible with Major Platforms and Systems - C950 4K webcam for laptop is fully compatible with Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, Cisco Webex, Facetime, GoToMeeting, Lifesize, Slack, Line, ensuring stable and high-quality online calls. Additionally, the 4K webcam with microphone works effortlessly across multiple systems such as Windows (Win10,11), macOS (10.14 and above), and Android TV V7.0 and above. It works seamlessly in USB Video Device Class mode. Tripod mounting is not supported.

name: EMEET C60E Dual-Camera 4K Webcam for Streaming, Wide-Angle and Telephoto Cameras, Max 11X Hybrid Zoom & PDAF Autofocus, Remote Control, RGB Lighting, 2 Mics, Ideal for Livestreaming and Online Meeting
short_description: 4K Dual-Camera Precision – The World's 1st Dual-Camera for Streaming features 2 cameras sharing a 1/2.8″ CMOS 4K sensor for superior clarity. The left gray wide-angle camera captures panoramic scenes with near focus for people and backgrounds, while the right blue telephoto camera delivers detailed close-ups at a recommended distance of 13.8 in. Switch freely between full-scene and close-up views to present every detail vividly in streaming, teaching, product demonstrations, or remote meetings.

Max 11X Hybrid Zoom & PDAF Autofocus – The 4K webcam for PC offers smooth zoom from 1X to 11X—with examples like 3X, 5X, 7X, and Max 11X—for seamless transitions between full-scene and close-up views. PDAF autofocus keeps every zoom stable, clear, and fast. With remote or EMEET STUDIO control, the web cam enables flexible framing without moving the camera. Zoom not supported in 4K, 60FPS, or YUY2 modes. The integrated system saves time, space, and setup effort for a more efficient workflow.

Smart Dual Control via Remote & EMEET STUDIO – C60E DUAL live streaming camera delivers a comprehensive image control experience, letting you manage every detail with ease. Remote control allows quick, real-timadjustments such as zoom and color without interrupting your stream, while EMEET STUDIO enables precise fine-tuning of brightness, focus, and RGB lighting. Together, they deliver online and offline control, offering superior flexibility and efficiency over typical single-mode webcams.

Expressive RGB Lighting Design – The nintendo switch 2 camera features vibrant RGB lighting—red, green, and blue—that adds visual impact and personality. Aesthetically, it creates a sleek, modern look that stands out from plain webcams. Functionally, the glow helps users locate the camera and shows active status clearly. Emotionally, its dual-eye design with RGB accents feels friendly and alive. Personally, colors set moods—red for energy, green for focus, and blue for calm professionalism.

Broad Compatibility & Clear Audio Capture – The streaming camera for gaming offers seamless compatibility across Windows 10/11 (64-bit), macOS 10.14+, and platforms like OBS, Twitch, YouTube, and Facebook. It connects easily via USB 2.0 Type-A with plug-and-play convenience and supports 1/4'' tripod mounting for flexible setups. 2 noise-canceling microphones capture clear, natural sound within a 9.8ft radius, ensuring smooth, high-quality communication for meetings, classes, or live streaming.
